title: The Rivals' Touch
description: Remi.I was a popular cheerleader and the queen bee until my father decided to relocate us to Aycliffe.Not only am I forced to attend the local high school and cheer for the rival team with Legacy, the head cheerleader, who hates me. I have also moved in with my boyfriend’s main rival, Zayd, the infuriating team captain of Aycliffe’s basketball team.The worst part? Zayd is holding something over my head. Something my boyfriend, Bennett, must never find out.How far am I willing to go to keep it hidden?As Zayd, his friend Jacob, and Legacy test my resolve, I find myself awakening to desires I never knew I had.Zayd.I plan to ruin Bennett’s life. First, I’ll steal the title from under his nose. Then his “High School Basketball Player of the Year” award and his girlfriend, Remi.Now she’s in my playground, and I don’t play nice.She refuses to cheerlead for me, but I’ll break her down. I’ll get her begging on her knees.This book is an FFMM dark romance. It contains sexual scenes and sexual assault/violence throughout. Please see the book preview for complete CW.
author: Harleigh Beck
